p: In the present study, all participants completed an online questionnaire that included the Beck Anxiety Inventory (BAI: Beck and Steer, 1993; Chinese version: Che et al., 2006), the Beck Depression Inventory – II (BDI-II: Beck et al., 1996; Chinese version: Wang et al., 2011), the Alcohol Use Disorder Identification Test (AUDIT: Saunders et al., 1993; Chinese version: Zhang et al., 2017), the Warwick Edinburgh Mental Wellbeing Scale (WEMWBS: Tennant et al., 2007; Chinese version: Zhao et al., 2019) and a personal information section (participants’ age, gender, province where they were living, educational qualification, profession, and monthly income, etc.).
